body.p:
PDU subfeeds are monitored with Eaton PDIâ€™s Branch Circuit Monitoring System (BCMS):
Each subfeed can have CTs for monitoring ABC phases and NG.
Resistor Boards: Subfeed CTs are terminated onto a Resistor Board. One Resistor Board can connect CTs for up to (14) subfeeds with 3-phase (ABC) monitoring or (10) subfeeds if neutrals are also monitored (ABCN). The standard PDU configuration has one Resistor Board. (See for position in PDU.)
Resistor Board(s) are connected to a BCMS Data Acquisition Board, which is loaded with the Enhanced Subfeeds (ESF) Points List. (See for location in PDU and Monitoring Compartment.)
